About Me

My Story...

Making a positive impact

My experience with exercise has been extensive; I have been weight training since the age of 12. It is my passion to empower people and guide them to achieve the perceived impossible. When I began college I knew I wanted to major in a field related to exercise, so I decided to pursue a Sports and Exercise Science degree. I have acquired a certification for a personal trainer through U.S.A Weight Lifting and NSCA. My knowledge of exercise goes beyond resistance training with background knowledge of sport performance and rehabilitation therapy. I live and breath exercise from training to recovery I have the best guidance on the market.

Patrick Farrell

“The workouts that Arius put me through helped improve my physical strength as well as my balance and flexibility. I feel stronger and healthier than ever. I have never felt or looked better and it is all thanks to Arius.”

Jessie Brown

“Arius is the perfect combination of tough and encouraging, exactly what I need in a fitness trainer. Since I started training, I stopped smoking and drinking beer. All I look forward now is to my work out with Arius.”

Casey Johnson

“I’ve trained with Arius for quite a while now and have never felt better or fitter. The results are stunning. I lost a lot of weight, but more importantly, I feel young again. Highly recommended!”
